text: Aktio–Vonitsa () is a municipality within the Aetolia-Acarnania regional unit, in the West Greece region, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town of Vonitsa.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of 660.172 km2. ==Municipality== The municipality Aktio–Vonitsa was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 3 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Anaktorio *Palairos (Kekropia) *Medeon ==References== Category:Municipalities of Western Greece Category:Populated places in Aetolia-Acarnania
title: Aktio-Vonitsa
